title: Affect-Based Multimedia Science Learning Design: Integration of Self-Explanation and Positive Agents

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: A neuroscience fundamentals course delivered in a smart device-centric, restricted environment. Requires a design integrating emotional engagement and generative learning activities for learners.

learning_goals: With support from digital agents that induce positive emotional responses, learners can explain synaptic transmission mechanisms with 85% or higher accuracy
Using self-explanation strategies, learners can reconstruct core concepts of learning content into three or more analogies
During video-based learning, learners increase learning efficiency by focusing on 70% or more of the key visual elements identified through eye-tracking data

resources: Mobile Learning Analytics Software with Eye-Tracking Functionality
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
